text:
With the pr you can do
```on(events(scene).keyboardbutton) do event
    if event.key = ...
        if event.action = Keyboard.release
            ...
        else # press or repeat
            ...
        end
    end
    return false
end ```
And if you need a key press to stop other stuff from happening you can have it return true with a high enough priority (most things are around priority 0 or 1 iirc).
